title: High Latency in Order Service due to Database Lock
solution: Check for long-running transactions in the database. Kill any blocking sessions and optimize the index on the queried table (e.g., order_id).

title: Service Unavailable due to Memory Leak in Image Processor
solution: Restart the affected service instance immediately to restore availability. Investigate memory profile and patch the leak in the image processing module.

title: Timeout in Payment Gateway due to Network Congestion
solution: Scale up network bandwidth or increase connection pool size. Implement a retry mechanism with exponential backoff for payment requests.

title: CPU Spike caused by Infinite Loop in Calculation Service
solution: Rollback the recent deployment of the calculation service. Fix the termination condition in the calculation loop logic.
